DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator that asks whether a re-occurrence of the same cancer was detected.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease is any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Sometimes the term is used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

ObjectClass.changeDescription: Updated to add EVS concept preferred name. dw

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had recurrent disease at least once during or after initial therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have recurrent carcinoma of the vulva?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient developed an initial recurrence that has not been previously reported?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the tumor a recurrent GBM?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient developed a recurrence that has not been previously reported?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had a prior recurrence?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CITN 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient with any type of recurrent pancreatic adenocarcinoma.

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have locally recurrent N1-N3 disease following surgery without prior radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: has the patient developed recurrence that has not been previously reported?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient developed a recurrence or progression that has not been previously reported?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the subject have recurrent or progressive HGG not including HGG as a subsequent neoplasm?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: For Stratum C patients only, does the subject have recurrent or progressive HGG at the time of enrollment?

DataElement.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElement.changeDescription: Replace VD Involvement Extent Disease Ind-3 (2018750v1.1) with VD Yes No Unknown Indicator (3506034v1) - dbw
